title: Basil ready to leave Parliament, concedes defeat to 21A
body_lines: SLPP MP Basil Rajapaksa has decided to step down from his parliamentary seat by tomorrow, sources said.
Rajapaksa had informed his party members that he would continue to be active in party politics but would not hold his parliamentary seat.

Rajapaksa was anyway expected to step down as MP as the 21st amendment is ready to be put to parliament. The amendment includes the clause that dual citizens will not be able to hold parliamentary seats or contest future elections.
Sources said the man tipped to take over Rajapaksa's seat is businessman Dhammika Perera. (JAMILA HUSAIN)
